title: House Tree Person
herosText: Some text will be put here to briefly talk about the project and maybe describe some aspects of it. Vision of the project can be stated here.

features.text: The AI model is trained on pairs of HTP drawings with a comprehensive data detailing various classifications.
Pressure, interrupted lines, chaotic lines, curved lines, size, location, detail, duplicated figures, disproportionate figures, repeatedly erased figures, rotated figures, shaded figures.
Sketches have specific attributes depending on their classifications: House, Person and Tree.

problemSectionText.oneLiner: Professionals face increasing challenges in handling complex cases, analyzing data, and making accurate assessments.

problems.text: Manually analyzing large volumes of patient data is time-consuming.
Psychological assessments depend heavily on individual interpretation.
Experts struggle to dedicate enough time to each case due to high demand.
Current tools do not provide deep, data-driven analysis.

solutionSectionText.intro: What if psychology experts had an intelligent assistant that helps analyze patterns, reduce workload, and provide data-driven insights? That‚Äôs exactly what our AI model does!

benefits.text: Our AI processes large amounts of psychological data in seconds.
Reduce human bias with AI-supported evaluations.
Spend more time on patients, less on manual work.
Get trend predictions for better decision-making.

dragDropText: Click or drag an image here

step1.text: Securely input patient records or test results.

step2.text: The model scans patterns and provides structured insights.

step3.text: Psychologists refine and validate AI-generated insights.

step4.text: Combined AI + human expertise leads to better outcomes.

featureSectionText.Intro: Modern psychological assessments demand precision, speed, and objectivity. Our AI-driven solution enhances expert decision-making by analyzing patterns, reducing workload, and providing intelligent insights.

features.text: Automatically identifies psychological patterns in patient data, reducing analysis time from hours to seconds.
Minimizes subjective interpretation by providing AI-supported, data-driven insights for expert validation.
Automates repetitive tasks, allowing professionals to focus on patient care rather than manual data analysis.
Utilizes historical data and AI models to predict trends, helping experts make more informed decisions.
Ensures strict data privacy and compliance with medical standards while handling sensitive patient records.

featureSectionText.CTA: Want to see how it works?
